languages.text: {n}В глазах блюстителей — почтительный страх, ведь им сегодня придется проявить себя не только перед Вольным Торговцем, но и перед {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}истинным профессионалом{/d} по части расследований и дознаний.{/n}

{n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В глазах блюстителей — почтительный страх, ведь им сегодня придется проявить себя не только перед Вольным Торговцем, но и перед {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}истинным профессионалом{/d} по части расследований и дознаний.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous lisez de l'effroi et du respect dans le regard du prévôt : il va non seulement devoir impressionner {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mais aussi un enquêteur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}expert{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous lisez de l'effroi et du respect dans le regard du prévôt : il va non seulement devoir impressionner {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, mais aussi un enquêteur {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}expert{/d}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エンフォーサーたちの目に、恐れと敬意の色が浮かんでいるのがわかる。なにしろ彼らは今日、ローグトレーダーにだけでなく、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}真の調査の達人{/d}に対しても、実力を示さなければならないのだから。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エンフォーサーたちの目に、恐れと敬意の色が浮かんでいるのがわかる。なにしろ彼らは今日、ローグトレーダーにだけでなく、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}真の調査の達人{/d}に対しても、実力を示さなければならないのだから。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazcıların gözünde korku ve saygı görüyorsun. Ne de olsa bugün kendilerini sadece Hür Tacir'e değil, aynı zamanda {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}gerçek bir soruşturma ustasına{/d} da kanıtlamaları gerekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İnfazcıların gözünde korku ve saygı görüyorsun. Ne de olsa bugün kendilerini sadece Hür Tacir'e değil, aynı zamanda {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}gerçek bir soruşturma ustasına{/d} da kanıtlamaları gerekiyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ves temor y respeto en los ojos del personal de seguridad. A fin de cuentas, hoy no solo responden ante un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, sino ante un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}verdader{mf|o|a} maestr{mf|o|a}{/d} de la investigación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves temor y respeto en los ojos del personal de seguridad. A fin de cuentas, hoy no solo responden ante un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, sino ante un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}verdader{mf|o|a} maestr{mf|o|a}{/d} de la investigación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你在所有执法者眼中看到了恐惧与尊重。毕竟，他们今天不仅要在行商浪人面前证明自己，更要在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}真正的调查专家{/d}面前证明自己。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你在所有执法者眼中看到了恐惧与尊重。毕竟，他们今天不仅要在行商浪人面前证明自己，更要在{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}真正的调查专家{/d}面前证明自己。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erkennst Angst und Respekt in den Augen der Enforcer – immerhin müssen sie sich heute nicht nur vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}, sondern auch vor dem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wahren Meister{/d} der Ermittlung beweisen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You see fear and respect in the enforcers' eyes — after all, not only must they prove themselves to the Rogue Trader today, but also to a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}true master{/d} of investigation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du erkennst Angst und Respekt in den Augen der Enforcer – immerhin müssen sie sich heute nicht nur vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}, sondern auch vor dem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Arbitrator}wahren Meister{/d} der Ermittlung beweisen.{/n}
